checkout-ideal-terms:
Select your bank and click "Pay Securely Now" to pay with iDeal at your bank.

Paying with iDEAL is free. You will be redirected to the secure (SSL) page of iDEAL to complete the payment for your order.
checkout-invalid-payment-description: Please review your payment details and try again
checkout-klarna-capture-intructions: You have selected to pay with Klarna
checkout-klarna-captured:
You will shortly receive payment information from our partner Klarna.
You can manage all your purchases via Klarna.com or the Klarna app and even pay with just one click.
If there are problems with the delivery, use the "Report a problem" function in the Klarna app to pause payment and avoid reminders.

You will shortly receive payment information from our partner Klarna.

checkout-payment-buy-now: Buy now, pay within 14 days of delivery. Making a payment through Klarna is secure and free of charge.
checkout-payment-error-description: Please check the data you entered or select a different payment method
checkout-payment-important: Important: To use the Pay After Delivery service, your shipping and billing address must be the same as your registered address.
checkout-payment-klarna-credit-term-desc: You must be 18+ to use this credit offer. Klarna uses soft searches with credit reference agencies. These do not affect your credit rating. Missed payments can affect your ability to use Klarna in the future.
checkout-payment-klarna-email-confirmati: Your payment is processed by our partner Klarna. You will shortly receive instructions on how to complete your payment. You can manage all your payments via Klarna.com or in the Klarna APP.
checkout-payment-klarna-pay-now-descript: With Klarna's secure and certified "Pay now" bank transfer method, you can pay safely and easily using your normal online banking data but without having to register. You will be redirected to sofort.com after you click ‚ÄúPAY SECURELY NOW‚Äù
checkout-payment-method-unavailable: This payment method is currently unavailable
checkout-payment-money-transfer-descript: With Klarna's secure and certified "Pay now" bank transfer method, you can pay safely and easily using your normal online banking data but without having to register. You will be redirected to sofort.com at the end of the ordering process to complete your order. You can find out more about how Klarna works in your country by heading to the Klarna customer service portal here.
checkout-payment-paypal-title: Paying with PayPal is free. You will be redirected to the secure (SSL) page of PayPal to complete the payment for your order.
